question: This bank and IFFCO introduced the co-branded debit cards for farmers?
explanation: Bank of Baroda (BOB) and Indian Farmers Fertiliser Cooperative Limited (IFFCO) launch its first set of co-branded debit cards for farmers and aimed them to buy agri-inputs through a convenient cashless transaction mechanism, thus providing further thrust to PM Narendra Modi's Digital India programme. wo lakh co-branded debit cards will be issued initially to the farmers beginning with the States of Uttar Pradesh, Bihar, Rajasthan and Madhya Pradesh.
